12.2. Persistence and degradability
Chlorine (7782-50-5)
Persistence and degradability
: Very toxic to aquatic life. Very toxic to aquatic life with long lasting effects.

12.4. Mobility in soil
Chlorine (7782-50-5)
Ecology - soil
: (no bioaccumulation expected)
Not applicable for inorganic products.
No data available.
Because of its high volatility, the product is unlikely to cause ground or water pollution. Partition
into soil is unlikely.
12.5. Other adverse effects
Other adverse effects
Effect on the ozone layer
Effect on global warming
Other information
: May cause pH changes in aqueous ecological systems.
: No effect on the ozone layer.
: No known effects from this product.
: Avoid release to the environment.
